short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super's Chrome Extension lets you manage your tasks and communications anywhere you are on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super is the AI agent for property management. Superâ€™s AI agent can manage phone calls, text messages, and email communications, as well as log tasks and updates for property management teams.

Download the Super Chrome Extension to take Super with you anywhere you are on the web, so you can pull up tasks, communication history, contact details, and make updates with ease. Pop open your extension to get access to your Super AI agent to ask it questions, summarize information, help you draft, and take actions on your behalf.

This extension is free to use for all current customers of Super. Simply login with your Super account to get started. If you are not a current customer, get started at hiresuper.com/demo.
